means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布恩 Bone的变体
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布恩住所名称，来源于地名Bohon

sentence.Network_en: This battery booster is a boon for photographers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种电池充电器是摄影工作者的好帮手。

sentence.Network_en: The new software will prove a boon to Internet users.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种新软件将会对互联网用户大有益处。

sentence.Network_en: He was tall, dark and handsome, like a Mills and Boon hero.
sentence.Network_cn: 他个头高大、皮肤黝黑、相貌堂堂，像通俗爱情小说的男主角。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... boo ? v. 用嘘声表示嘲笑 boon ? n. 恩惠, 福利 boor ? n. 迟钝的人, 粗野的人.
俞敏洪单词串讲 - annjining的日志 - 网易博客 ... bolster 枕垫,v支持,支撑 boon 恩惠,恩赐 boring 无聊的.
英语词根词典_百度文库 ... bonus 红利,奖金 boon 恩物,恩赐 bounty 奖金,慷慨好施.
boom 繁荣boon 恩惠，福利boor 粗野的人

list.abs: a bicycle is a real boon when you live in a small town ., 住在小城镇上 , 有辆自行车确实极为方便.
companion... ... companion fault 副断层 boon companion 酒肉朋友 centre bearing companion yoke nut 中心轴承连轭螺母.
Parks a great boon to people in big cities ., 在大城市里 , 公园是人们的好去处.
the aid was a great boon for the country ., 这项援助对国家有极大的好处.
on balance , of course , technology is more of a boon than a problem , though the gains are uneven .当然，总的来说，尽管增益参差不齐，但技术更多的是一种恩惠而非问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (originally in the sense 'request for a favour'): from Old Norse bón

entry.tran: 给生活带来方便的事物
entry.def: You can describe something as a boon when it makes life better or easier for someone.

example.ex: It is for this reason that television proves such a boon to so many people...
example.tran: 就是因为这个原因，电视才会给这么多人带来如此大的便利。

example.ex: This battery booster is a boon for photographers.
example.tran: 这种电池充电器是摄影工作者的好帮手。

sentences.sentence: "a spanking breeze is a boon to sailors"

auth_sentence.content: The lost could be a boon to science however.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lost could be a boon to science however.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lost could be a boon to science however.

auth_sentence.content: The competition has been a boon to traders.
auth_sentence.res_content: The competition has been a boon to traders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The competition has been a boon to traders.

auth_sentence.content: The Mills & Boon or Harlequin novels of their day.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Mills & Boon or Harlequin novels of their day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Mills & Boon or Harlequin novels of their day.

means.word_mean: 恩惠, 福利, 裨益, 方便

sentences.en: These machines have proved a real boon to disabled people.
sentences.cn: 事实证明这些机器让残疾人受益匪浅。

sentences.en: The building scheme comes as an enormous boon for the building industry.
sentences.cn: 该建筑方案为建筑业带来巨大的好处。

sentences.en: A car is a real boon when you live in the country.
sentences.cn: 在郊外居住, 有辆汽车确实极为方便。
